If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Rachel Pally minored in Dance at the University of California-Berkeley, and this background cultivated her appreciation for grace, fluidity, and expression. These elements may just be the backbone of every piece in the designer's collection. Rachel Pally takes the incredible comfort of jersey and gives it a luxurious and sophisticated look. The designs are timeless and sexy, and it's no surprise, as the designer counts Catherine Deneuve and Martha Graham among her muses.
